record.titleTypeName: University of Chicago Press, Minstrel Show, 1927
record.description: Minstrel Show staged by the UC Press (printing department) Men's Club Dramatic League at Reynolds Club Theater, December 1, 1927. From the press files. [Back row, left to right: E. Curtis, F. Swanberg, G. Aubrey, J. Sturdevant, C.A. Orton (interlocutor), J. Feller, A. Malchau, E. McCumber, J. Dwyer. Front row, left to right: A.R. Nelson (end man), C. Zemke, A. Cozzello, J. Greenberg, I. Moranz, J. Dornbos, S. Blinick, J. Oslakovic, W. Hamilton, J.M. Smith (end man).]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
